org.araneaframework.uilib.list.structure.filter
Interface FilterContext

All Superinterfaces:
ListContext
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseFilterHelper, FieldFilterHelper, FilterHelper
public interface FilterContext
extends ListContext

Filter context. Interface that is used by list filters during their initialization to access current list and global filter configuration.

isStrict

boolean isStrict()
Returns whether new filters should be strict.

E.g. when adding e GreaterThan filter, strict does not allow two values to be equal.

Returns:
whether new filters should be strict.
